page.title: 12HULL KINGSTON ROVERS R.L.F.C
page.content:
Hull Kingston Rovers have 3 Australian players;John Dorahy,Gavin Miller and Bruce Miller and 2 from New Zealand; Gordon Smith and Gary Prohm.Several players are Great Britain International players including the captain David Watkinson. Since Roger Millward took over as coach in 1977,Rovers have enjoyed their most successful period ever,winning the following trophies;_ 1977-78 Floodlit Trophy 1978-79 First Division Champions 1979-80 Challenge Cup 1980-81 Premiership 1983-84 First Division Champions; Premiership. 1984-85 First Division Champions; John Player Special Trophy.
David Maxey.
